title: About YU HWA
subtitle: We focus on innovation and integration in textile smart manufacturing

intro.title: Company Introduction
intro.p1: Founded in 1970, YU HWA was the first textile machine parts manufacturer in Taiwan to introduce air nozzle technology.
intro.p2: We specialize in developing intelligent quality monitoring systems, sensors, and machine integration solutions, dedicated to supporting digital transformation in traditional industries.
intro.p3: With innovation, precision, and trust as our core values, YU HWA continues to overcome technical challenges and improve production efficiency and product quality.

core.title: Core Values
core.desc1: Relentlessly pursuing technological innovation to develop smarter and more efficient solutions, leading the direction of industrial development.
core.desc2: Utilizing high-precision sensing and data analytics to provide accurate production monitoring and ensure consistent product quality.
core.desc3: Earning customer trust with professional technology and premium service, becoming a reliable partner for manufacturing transformation.

s1.title: Cross-brand Machine Integration Experience
s1.desc: Proven experience integrating mainstream and legacy machines, supporting multi-brand centralized management.

s2.title: Sensor R&D Capability
s2.desc: In-house development of yarn fuzz and tension sensors, offering full hardware-software solutions.

s3.title: AI Data Analysis Technology
s3.desc: Applying AI for anomaly prediction and quality assessment, advancing system intelligence.

s4.title: System Customization and Factory Planning
s4.desc: Customizable modules and workflows tailored to client needs, helping plan optimal smart factory architecture.
